content.text: Match ends, Watford 0, West Bromwich Albion 0.
Second Half ends, Watford 0, West Bromwich Albion 0.
Nyom (Watford) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
James McClean (West Bromwich Albion) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Nyom (Watford).
Substitution, West Bromwich Albion. Callum McManaman replaces Saido Berahino.
Foul by Claudio Yacob (West Bromwich Albion).
Odion Ighalo (Watford) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Attempt saved. Almen Abdi (Watford) left footed shot from outside the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Ikechi Anya.

Claudio Yacob (West Bromwich Albion) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
